comments:
Steps:
1.Right Click "Data Sets", select New Data Set
2.Click "Finish" button(Data Source have predefined)
3.Click "OK" button

Expected Results:
1.System should be give a error message

Actual Results:
1.System throws exception

org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Failed to prepare the 
following query for the data set type 
(org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc.JdbcSelectDataSet).

from ]

Users with basic database knowledge would've noticed that a legal sql is 
necessary for any db-based application to run.
The requirement of a more specific error message is kinda reasonable but hard 
to meet for the time being.
